m_szDocTitle: BMW hydrogen fuel cell car expected by 2020
m_szDocSumamry: BMW entered the world of hydrogen-powered cars with the 750hL. Photo by Jay Ramey Partnership with Toyota expected to yield i-series hydrogen EV from BMW BMW will offer a mass-produced hydrogen fuel-cell car by 2020, AutoExpress reports, citing sources within the company. The German automaker indicated that it was working to offer an electric car powered by a hydrogen fuel cell, with analysts expecting it to be part of the i lineup. "We will still be developing the technologies and doing everything else behind the scenes, but we will pass on the chance to do a production car from the first gen
